# Introduction

in the media that the companies complain that they can't find workers to fill open 
roles while some job seekers remain desperate that they can not even get a job
after filling out hundreds of applications. Another common scenario is that the job openings 
and average salary statistical data varies a lot among different college major. It's quiet interesting 
to dive into the job market area and trying to dig out some fun aspects.
